sentence.Network_en: He pulled sedately out of the short driveway.
sentence.Network_cn: 他慢慢地把车开出了巴掌大的私人车道。

sentence.Network_en: Life in the country's south - west glides along rather sedately.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国西南部的生活就相对比较平静.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(S2) ... sedate 沉着的 sedately 镇静地 sedateness 安详.
她的衣服全给弄皱了。6.sedately adv. 镇静地，安详地She conducts herself sedately.
英文阅读：The Reader: 第二周进度 ... 5.interlude: 插曲 6 1.sedately: 静静地 1.call down: 斥责.

list.abs: ...缓和镇静（palliative sedation)，也称临终镇静（terminal sedation）,在医学上指通过持续皮下注射或静脉滴注镇静剂来减轻临终关怀|临终病人痛苦的方法。==常见条件==临终关怀中对有痛苦症状的临终病人，应优先采取常规对症治疗，例如用止痛药控制疼痛，用精神药品控制谵妄等。<br.
近年来还推行清醒麻醉(conscious sedation)［10］。该方法是静脉给镇静药,如苯二氮卓(benzodia-zepines),同时配合一些镇痛药如芬 …
表示「无痛」其实是只一种朦胧麻醉(conscious sedation)，在合格麻醉医师及足够的设备监视下，给予适合剂量的镇静剂及止痛药剂…
日常生活 daily life日间镇静 daytime sedation衰退 decay
深度镇静(Deep Sedation) 面部表情(Facial Expression) 马(Horses) 肌张力(Muscle Tonus) 喉(Larynx) 标引反馈-送充值卡

entry.tran: 安静的;庄重的;不苟言笑的;平淡无奇的
entry.def: If you describe someone or something as sedate, you mean that they are quiet and rather dignified, though perhaps a bit dull.

example.ex: She took them to visit her sedate, elderly cousins...
example.tran: 她带他们去拜访她那些不苟言笑的表兄表姐们。

example.ex: Her London life was sedate, almost mundane...
example.tran: 她在伦敦的生活平淡无奇，几乎有些枯燥。

entry.tran: 不慌不忙的;慢悠悠的;从容的
entry.def: If you move along at a sedate pace, you move slowly, in a controlled way.

example.ex: We set off again at a more sedate pace.
example.tran: 我们重新上路了，步调更加从容。

example.ex: ...a heavy car with solid but sedate performance.
example.tran: 一辆性能稳定但行驶缓慢的重型汽车

entry.def: If someone is sedated, they are given a drug to calm them or to make them sleep.

example.ex: The patient is sedated with intravenous use of sedative drugs...
example.tran: 静脉注射了镇静剂后病人安然入睡。

example.ex: Doctors have been told not to sedate children with an anaesthetic that may be linked to five deaths.
example.tran: 医生们已被告知不要给儿童使用麻醉剂，因为它可能与5起死亡病例有关。

auth_sentence.content: In subsequent meetings with potential investors, Kaplan dressed sedately and wore glasses.
auth_sentence.res_content: In subsequent meetings with potential investors, Kaplan dressed sedately and wore glasses.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In subsequent meetings with potential investors, Kaplan dressed sedately and wore glasses.

auth_sentence.content: The normally joyous "Black Market" canters a touch too sedately for it to ever really take off in the way we know it can.
auth_sentence.res_content: The normally joyous "Black Market" canters a touch too sedately for it to ever really take off in the way we know it can.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The normally joyous "Black Market" canters a touch too sedately for it to ever really take off in the way we know it can.

auth_sentence.content: She spends the time that is left walking sedately with her father, in her finest clothes.
auth_sentence.res_content: She spends the time that is left walking sedately with her father, in her finest clothes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She spends the time that is left walking sedately with her father, in her finest clothes.
